message.adm2.command_not_player: You must be a player to use this command
message.adm2.command_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this command
message.adm2.portal_wand_classic_fail: Please use the regular portal wand instead
message.adm2.teleport_fail: No block found to teleport to
message.adm2.useless: You feel a sense of uselessness...
tooltip.adm2.portal_wand: Use on a portal frame to create a portal
tooltip.adm2.portal_wand_classic: With Immersive Portals, use this to create a classic portal instead
tooltip.adm2.teleport_wand: Use to teleport, use while sneaking to teleport on top
tooltip.adm2.summon_wand: Use on a block to save it, use again to summon a portal frame
tooltip.adm2.random_wand: Use on a block to summon a random portal frame
tooltip.adm2.list_wand: Use to place valid blocks, use while sneaking to place portals
tooltip.adm2.blink_wand: Use on air or on a block to teleport to a dimension
tooltip.adm2.debug_wand: Use to print debug info to console, use while sneaking to print in chat
tooltip.adm2.useless_wand: Use to feel a sense of uselessness...
